title: Free 2 Game Mentoring For Support Mains (Bronze/Low-Silver)
body:
Hey everyone, I'm a support main in Gold IV currently. 

I'd like to think I got good knowledge of the game, but there's definitely things that I can show you while you play. I hope you guys can learn something from this. It'll mostly boil down to champions, builds and instinct. 

If you're currently a support main in low silver or bronze, send me a friend request in game.

Skype is a necessity (or any other voice chat). 

Hopefully some of you are interested in this!
-Sud (IGN: AlphaCueSlowly)

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Knuuckles,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=v0OKgErA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-04T22:31:04.859+0000)
>
> Lol

Gee thanks, I guess me attempting to help out the minority, least-preferred role in LoL for free warrants a condescending "Lol". Enjoy your day buddy.
This is hilarious but I like that you want to help. Maybe if I wasn't already gold and didn't dislike support I would take up the offer.

> [{quoted}](name=Vhaegor,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=v0OKgErA,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-11-05T04:44:26.871+0000)
>
> This is hilarious but I like that you want to help. Maybe if I wasn't already gold and didn't dislike support I would take up the offer.

Cheers.
